level.text: There is established an advisory committee to provide oversight and review of the assessment and analysis described in § 7-1932(b)(7). The advisory committee shall consist of 5 members, 2 of whom shall be appointed by the Mayor and 3 of whom shall be appointed by the Council.
The advisory committee shall meet at a regular time and place to be determined by the committee. The advisory committee shall dissolve when its oversight and review role is complete.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction in subsec. (a).
